colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES BSANGS CHO GA MDOR BSDUS 'DI YANG STOBS KYI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA'I ^ 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA CHEN MO'I NANG BLON BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG AE PH'U WANG GA-YUNG DRUNG RDO RJE'I SA RGYAL KHAB CHEN POR PHEN SHING, YUN SHING, YUS SHING, LE'I SHING, ZHES PA RLUNG SPRIN CHAR GLOG GI BDAG PO RNAMS LA BSANG MCHOD BYED TSUL ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BAR BRTEN ^ SH'AKYA'I RJES 'JUG THA SHAL BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'I YI GE'I 'DU BYED BLO BZANG YI DAM GYIS BGYIS PA DZA YANTU,, ,,)
